TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrinterSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定有关在从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印时如何打印文档的信息，包括打印文档的打印机。

span.span: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，你访问通过或属性以修改打印机设置。Typically, you access a through or properties to modify printer settings. 最常见的打印机设置是，它指定要打印到打印机。The most common printer setting is , which specifies the printer to print to. 有关打印功能与 Windows 窗体的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果你想要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将在指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 此示例包括三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 一个名为变量`filePath`已设置为该文件的路径为打印。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 一个名为方法`pd_PrintPage`，它将处理事件，已定义。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 一个名为变量`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数初始化为其默认值的所有字段。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 通常情况下，你不创建的实例，而是改用设置打印机设置。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要打印使用双工，并且如果打印机支持它，之一值。To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set to one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Collate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打印文档是否逐份打印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.

value.span: 若文档是逐份打印的，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the printed document is collated; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当副本数大于 1 时，才执行排序。Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1. 设置属性来指定要打印的份数。Set the property to specify the number of copies to print. 设置到`true`下一步复制的第一页打印之前将打印文档的完整副本。Setting to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed. `false` 将通过指定打印下一页之前的份数打印每一页。`false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short Copies { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要打印的文档份数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.

value.span: 要打印的份数。

span.span: The number of copies to print.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有打印机都支持打印多份。Not all printers support printing multiple copes. 你可以使用属性来确定的最大数将打印机支持复制。You can use the property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports. 如果设置的副本数高于受打印机的最大副本，将打印仅最大副本数，并不会出现异常。If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur. > [!NOTE] > 一些打印机可能不支持一次打印多个副本。Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero.

span.span: Returns a that contains printer information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与方法，你可以获取而无需创建打印作业的打印机。With the method, you can obtain a for the printer without creating a print job. 你可以使用以确定如何向布局如字体、 大小和复杂的打印作业的类型样式的可视元素。You can use the to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页设置包括在页上的边距的大小、 纸若要使用，以及是否要以彩色打印的大小。Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color. 有关页设置的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about page settings, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性由当用户选择打印范围。The and properties are used by the when the user selects a print range. 属性必须设置为`true`，使用户能够指定打印范围。The property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range. 此外，需要和指定与值要在该范围内。In addition, the requires the and to be specified and the value to be within that range. 在打印过程中，在事件中查看来确定应该打印的内容。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果是，使用和应打印属性来确定页。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果是，然后指定仅对所选的页面的输出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. ，和也可以设置以编程方式，但实现都是相同。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int GetHdevmode() cil managed

summary.span: 创建与打印机设置相对应的 结构的句柄。

span.span: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
A handle to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 结构是特定的设备。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. 复制`DEVMODE`结构从一个到不支持另一台打印机。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 完成通过此方法创建的句柄后，你必须亲自通过调用本机 Win32`GlobalFree`方法。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 在调用此方法时，你将作为参数传递的返回值方法。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

exception.span: 属性中命名的打印机不存在。

span.span: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.

permission.span: 针对打印和对网络上的所有打印机的访问。

span.span: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
Associated enumeration:

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 结构是特定的设备。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. 复制`DEVMODE`结构从一个到不支持另一台打印机。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 完成通过此方法创建的句柄后，你必须亲自通过调用本机 Win32`GlobalFree`方法。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 在调用此方法时，你将作为参数传递的返回值方法。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property InstalledPrinters As PrinterSettings.StringCollection

summary.span: 获取安装在计算机上所有打印机的名称。

span.span: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.

value.span: ，它表示安装在计算机上所有打印机的名称。

span.span: A that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已安装的打印机名称的集合可用于提供一种打印机来打印到的用户。You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to. ## Examples 下面的代码示例填充`comboInstalledPrinters`与安装的打印机的组合框，并设置要使用的打印的打印机属性，当所选内容更改时。The following code example populates the `comboInstalledPrinters` combo box with the installed printers and also sets the printer to print, using the property, when the selection changes. `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo`正在初始化窗体时调用例程。The `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine is called when the form is being initialized. 该示例需要变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终返回`false`时显式设置为字符串值以外的其他属性`null`。 always returns `false` when you explicitly set the property to a string value other than `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体并调用`PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取指示该打印机是否是绘图仪的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.

span.span: if the printer is a plotter; if the printer is a raster.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘图仪是而不是基于光栅的基于矢量的打印机。A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based. 大多数基于矢量的打印机使用单独的绘图笔生成输出。Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.

span.span: if the property designates a valid printer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您获取或设置一些属性时，有效打印机是必需，否则将引发异常。When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised. 若要避免异常，请使用属性之后设置以安全地确定打印机是否有效。To avoid exceptions, use the property after setting the to safely determine if the printer is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置指定的目标打印机属性，并且如果是`true`，将在指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 此示例包括三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 一个名为变量`filePath`已设置为该文件的路径为打印。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 一个名为方法`pd_PrintPage`，它将处理事件，已定义。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 一个名为变量`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LandscapeAngle As Integer
public: property int LandscapeAngle { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取旋转纵向方向以生成横向方向的角度，以度为单位。

span.span: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

value.span: 从纵向到横向所需旋转的角度（以度为单位）。

span.span: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的旋转的值为 90 和 270 度。Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees. 如果不支持横向，唯一有效的旋转值为 0 度。If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees. 你设置属性`true`打印横向格式中的页。You set the property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaximumCopies As Integer
public: property int MaximumCopies { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印机允许用户一次打印的最大份数。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.

value.span: 打印机允许用户一次打印的最大份数。

span.span: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为要打印的份数。Set the property to the number of copies to print. 使用属性以确定是否打印机支持一次打印多个副本，因为一些打印机不这样做。Use the property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含表示通过纸张大小的实例属性，其中包含之一值。The contains instances that represent the paper sizes through the property, which contains one of the values. 通常情况下，将通过的页面的纸张大小的设置到有效的属性可通过集合。Typically, you set a page's paper size through the property to a valid available through the collection. 若要指定自定义的纸张大小，请参阅构造函数。To specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例填充`comboPaperSize`与打印机的组合框的支持纸张大小。The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes. 此外，自定义的纸张大小被创建并添加到组合框。In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box. 被标识为提供有关通过将要添加的项的显示字符串的属性属性的组合框。The is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the property of the combo box. 该示例需要变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. value.span: 要使用的打印机的名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设置打印机名称之后, 调用以确定是否打印机名称识别为有效的打印机系统上。After setting the printer name, call to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system. 你还可以使用属性来获取系统上安装的打印机的列表。You can also use the property to get a list of printers installed on the system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置指定的目标打印机属性，并且如果是`true`，将在指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 此示例包括三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 一个名为变量`filePath`已设置为该文件的路径为打印。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 一个名为方法`pd_PrintPage`，它将处理事件，已定义。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 一个名为变量`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由。 在用户选择打印范围。The property is used by the .when the user selects a print range. 默认的 为 `AllPages`。The default is `AllPages`. 若要使用户能够指定要打印的页范围属性必须设置为`true`。To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 若要使用户能够指定所选要打印的压，属性必须设置为`true`。To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 在打印过程中，在事件中查看来确定应该打印的内容。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果是，使用和应打印属性来确定页。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果是，然后指定仅对所选的页面的输出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. ，和也可以设置以编程方式，但实现都是相同。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由当用户选择**打印到文件**选项。The property is used by the when the user selects the **Print to file** option. 在这种情况下，输出端口设置为"文件"会导致 Windows 打印子系统来提示用户输入文件名称时调用方法。In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅供并且不能以编程方式设置。The property is only used by the and cannot be set programmatically. `Print to file`上才会显示选项时属性设置为`true`。The `Print to file` option only appears on the when the property is set to `true`.
